about_the_game:
The action-packed soundtrack for OK K.O.! Let’s Play Heroes features 34 stellar tracks that are the perfect backdrop for brawling with Boxmore bots. Crank up the volume and get ready to rock out!

Composed, produced and mixed by doseone
Mastered by Ben Wright

Tracklist:

01 - OK KO THE GAME OF THE SHOW

02 - PLAZAMANIA
03 - LITTLE MAN BIG TIME
04 - AFTER BATTLE MINT
05 - CONCERTO IN RAD MINOR
06 - MINI MAULER
07 - PINATA BASH BREAK DOWN
08 - MILD ISLES
09 - KNOWLEDGE DROP
10 - DENDY KNOWS BEST
11 - GO RAMBO KO
12 - MOP MOMBO
13 - PART TIME TROUBLE
14 - GIMMIE GIFTS
15 - DEEP THOUGHT THUMP
16 - LOGIK CUTS
17 - MOMS RULE
18 - DOJO DANCER
19 - COLOR TUESDAY
20 - POW CARD BINDER BEAT BOX
21 - TEEN ALLEY TWEE
22 - GAR 4 PRESIDENT
23 - PUNCHY IS FOREVER
24 - FOUGHT THOUGHTS
25 - ENID IN REPOSE
26 - ALL FRIENDS NEED ANTHEMS
27 - HUSTLE MUSCLE
28 - KNOWLEDGE DROP II RETURN OF BRAINS
29 - FRAME SHOP TROT
30 - HERO ALERT
31 - CONVENIENCE STORE SONATA
32 - BOXMORE RISING
33 - BOXMORE BOSS BEAT DOWN DELIVERY SERVICE
34 - THAT GAME OVER GLOW

  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
